responsibilities: Executed daily updates to client websites and landing pages to ensure content accuracy and SEO optimization.

Analyzed monthly performance metrics using Google Analytics to provide actionable insights for campaign strategy adjustments.

Conducted market research on competitor pricing and promotional strategies to inform internal quarterly reports.
Drafted and edited copy for weekly email newsletters and promotional blog posts.
